description:
A French-Canadian take on an English Classic. The culinary wizards at Happy Yak have worked their magic on this pastoral delight, presenting an authentic pâté chinois.

  • Happy Yak knows that some MUST have a little ketchup with their pâté chinois, so they have included 2 pouches of Heinz 57®
  • Ingredients: beef mix (freeze-dried extra lean ground beef (beef, onion, spices), freeze-dried corn) gravy (glucose solids, corn starch, hydrolysed corn protein, potato starch, garlic powder, sugar, caramel, yeast extract, onion powder, salt, tomato powder, spices), dehydrated onion flakes. potato mix (potato flakes, skimmed milk powder, salt, spices.)
  • May contain: peanuts, sesame, egg, milk, fish, sea food, soy, wheat and mustard
name: Happy Yak Shepherds Pie
